archimate:InformationConcept.name: Information Concept
archimate:InformationConcept.documentation: An Information Concept is a high level description of a classification of information that has relevance from a business perspective. The Information Concept is used to model distinct categories of information that are thought to be of value to the business or essential. Information Concepts are passive. They do not trigger or perform processes. Information Concepts may be associated with Value Stream Stages, Service Lines and Customer Facing Services.
